about_the_game:
Get ready for an electrifying space adventure with Quantum Gravity! This neon-styled bullet hell action game will have you blasting your way through space, using your wits and skills to survive against all odds. With a variety of game modes to choose from, Quantum Gravity offers a thrilling and unique experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat.



For the ultimate test of your skills, try Infinity Mode. With infinite levels that increase in difficulty, Infinity Mode is perfect for players who want to push themselves to the limit. Battle against a wide variety of enemies, including bosses and tough melee combatants, and see how far you can make it in this hardcore game mode.


Customization
Quantum Gravity offers an extensive customization system, allowing you to upgrade your health, ammo, and damage with in-game credits. You can also choose from over 15 different skins to personalize your gameplay experience.


Let's check out something else too...



Gravity Mode adds a whole new dimension to Quantum Gravity's gameplay. In this mode, you can invert the player's mechanics and the gravity of the objects around you. This creates a uniquely complex experience that requires careful planning and strategy. You'll need to stay on your toes as you navigate this treacherous environment and face off against enemies that can move in any direction.


Multiplayer Mode
Challenge your friends and compete in thrilling PvP rounds with up to 7 players. The rules are the same, but the action is always different, making for a dynamic and exciting gameplay experience. The mode is fully customizable and can be modified by each client to create new and interesting game modes.


Campaign Mode
Embark on a challenging campaign featuring unique and engaging levels. From defending hostages to destroying targets and solving puzzles, Campaign Mode offers a wide range of gameplay experiences that will put your skills to the test. You'll have access to all the equipment of a bullet hell shooter, and the action never stops – with every update and event, the Campaign Mode changes to suit the occasion, making the experience infinitely replayable.

With simple controls and logic that anyone can understand, Quantum Gravity is the perfect game for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a casual player looking for a fun way to pass the time or a hardcore gamer looking for a challenge, Quantum Gravity has something for everyone.

So what are you waiting for? Blast off into space and start your adventure with Quantum Gravity today!

short_description: Get ready for intense space combat in Quantum Gravity! Invert gravity to soar through space, engaging in long-range and melee battles against a variety of enemies. With four game modes, including Infinity Mode and multiplayer PvP, there's never a dull moment in this action-packed bullet hell game!
